As a Software Engineering Intern at Meta, I contributed to the development of the Facebook Rooms product, a video chat platform for iOS. I integrated the appâ€™s engine with Appleâ€™s Software Development Kit, to enable screen sharing functionality natively within the app. My work involved programming in Objective-C and C++, to enhance the usability and functionality of the product.
